Reason: The configuration option internode_application_receive_queue_reserve_endpoint_capacity_in_bytes in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive. This configuration directly impacts the capacity allocated for receiving data between nodes in the cluster. A change in this value can significantly affect the system's ability to handle incoming data traffic efficiently, leading to potential bottlenecks or performance degradation. Therefore, it is crucial to carefully tune this configuration to ensure optimal system performance.
